p: The acute toxicity of chloroform fraction was screen in doses, 100, 250, 500, and 1,000 mg/kg. During 24 h assessment no toxicity was observed. Similarly, daturaolone ( 1) in doses of, 5, 10, 20, and 50 mg/kg showed no mortality during 24 h of assessment. Neither gross behavior changes nor mortality was observed for the extract and daturaolone ( 1).
